meta.description: Special guest, cardiologist Dr. Pradip Jamnadas discusses how intermittent fasting can be used to help treat Long COVID and post-vaccine symptoms, as well as how it can benefit general health. Dr. Paul Marik reviews FLCCC's new Eat Well Guide to Fasting and Healthy Eating

title: Intermittent Fasting for Health
cleaned_text:
Special guest, cardiologist Dr. Pradip Jamnadas discusses how intermittent fasting can be used to help treat long COVID and post-vaccine symptoms, as well as how it can benefit general health.

Dr. Paul Marik reviews FLCCC’s new Eat Well Guide to Fasting and Healthy Eating

opengraph.title: Intermittent Fasting for Health

Special guest, cardiologist Dr. Pradip Jamnadas discusses how intermittent fasting can be used to help treat long COVID and post-vaccine symptoms, as well as how it can benefit general health.

Dr. Paul Marik reviews FLCCC's new Eat Well Guide to Fasting and Healthy Eating
